verify_profile_id.description: The identifier of the Verify profile to update.

default_verification_timeout_secs.description: For every request that is initiated via this Verify profile, this sets the number of seconds before a verification request code expires. Once the verification request expires, the user cannot use the code to verify their identity.

speech_template.description: Optionally sets a speech text template when sending the verification code. Uses `{code}` to template in the actual verification code.
speech_template.example: Hello, this is the Acme Inc verification code you requested: {code}.
